title: Fredericksburg & Spotsylvania National Military Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved         Volunteer leading a walking tour at Chancellorsville. Want to get involved? Consider volunteering! NPS Photo    How can I help to preserve and share this part of American history?  Whether you volunteer your time behind the information desk or painting signs, shop in the bookstore, intern for a season, or join one of our Friends groups, being a part of your National Park Service team makes our park and community a better place! Ask any of our volunteers, and they'll say that completing a project or assisting a visitor in finding his or her ancestor is one of the most rewarding aspects of the job.         Volunteer or Intern Serve the park for a summer as an intern, volunteer for a specific project, or volunteer year-round at one of our visitor centers or historic sites. Learn more about volunteering or our internship program.  Looking for an unique internship opportunity? Consider applying for the park's NPS Centennial & Digital History Internship for the summer of 2016!  Partner Up! Want to help the park raise funds for preservation or repair work? Check out our partners and Friends groups.  Help Us Plan for the Future Want to contribute your thoughts for the park's future? Be a part of our planning process! Browse park plans and let us know what you think. Donate Give back to the park you love!
